main event: A bright, white, stationary object the size of a dime was observed in the sky for 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright and white in color.
The observer stated the object remained stationary and motionless.
The object was moving west during the observation.
The sighting occurred on November 7, 1957 in Floral Park, Long Island, NY.
The report includes weather details and information about the observer, a 14-year-old student.
result: Inconclusive (possibly a balloon or astronomical object)
photographs: Yes, the report indicates photographs were taken, but they are not included in the provided materials.
